name: Ball run and rush
description: Ball run and rush is a platerform game. You need to take all items to finish the game. Can you ?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: ATI 6870, GTX 750 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Compatible directX 9
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or + Processor: I5 3,4Gh Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 960 GTX DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Compatible directX 9
